is_researched: #boolean that determines if tech is researched from the start of game
req_items: #list of ids of req items, calculus for research_databank amount is tier -1 , if you want to have 0 research_databank cost you can specify by adding research_materials:0 to list
is_disabled: #boolean that determines if reserarch is disabled
disabled_factor: #here you insert name of boolean from settings.json that determines if your industry is eneabled, if left then API is treating as none of field exists
